item.title: 德国工厂订单猛增，大型运输项目激增 87
item.description: 德国 10 月份工厂订单激增，支持了欧洲最大经济体在今年最后一个季度实现增长的前景。【原文：German factory orders surged in October, supporting the prospect that Europe’s biggest economy eked out growth in the final quarter of the year.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯（Halifax）称，英国房价在里夫斯预算案公布前持平
item.description: 英国最大的抵押贷款机构之一提供的数据显示，对加税的担忧对房地产市场产生了抑制作用。【原文：UK house prices stalled ahead of the budget, according to data from one of the biggest mortgage lenders that suggested fears of tax rises had a dampening effect on the property market.】

item.title: 中国百度被指考虑在香港为人工智能芯片部门昆仑万维上市
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，百度公司正在考虑将其昆仑万维的人工智能芯片业务在香港上市，因为该公司希望利用投资者对中国试图设计与英伟达公司竞争的产品的兴趣。【原文：Baidu Inc. is considering listing its Kunlunxin AI chip business in Hong Kong, people familiar with the matter said, as it looks to tap investor interest in China’s attempts to design products to compete with Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 英镑攀升，欧洲股市蓄势待发
印度 NIIF 考虑出售智能电表公司 IntelliSmart 的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度国家投资和基础设施基金正在考虑出售其持有的 IntelliSmart Infrastructure 51% 的股份。【原文：India’s National Investment and Infrastructure Fund is considering selling its 51% stake in IntelliSmart Infrastructure, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非出售 35 亿美元欧洲债券需求激增
item.description: 南非在出售美元债券时筹集了 35 亿美元，吸引了近四倍于这一数额的需求，这是投资者涌向该国金融资产的最新迹象。【原文：South Africa raised $3.5 billion in a sale of dollar bonds that attracted demand for almost four times that amount, the latest sign of investors flocking to the nation’s financial assets.】

item.title: 荷兰养老金改革将推动欧盟内部从长期债券转向长期债券
item.description: 由于荷兰养老金制度的全面改革减少了对较长期限债券的需求，欧洲国家看来将降低其借款期限。【原文：European nations look set to lower the length of their borrowing as an overhaul of the Dutch pension system reduces demand for longer-maturity bonds.】

item.title: 南非 PE 公司和贷款人支持投资 6 亿美元的刚果陆港
item.description: 南非私募股权公司和贷款人将以债务和股权形式投资 6 亿美元，在刚果民主共和国建设一个陆港，以缓解非洲最繁忙的矿产走廊之一的拥堵状况。【原文：South African private equity firms and lenders will invest $600 million in debt and equity on a dry port in the Democratic Republic of Congo to ease congestion on one of Africa’s busiest mineral corridors.】

item.title: 巴厘岛考虑禁止 Airbnb，以遏制旅游业混乱局面
item.description: 巴厘岛正在考虑禁止 Airbnb 公司提供住宿，这是巴厘岛最近一次试图对这个正在努力应对创纪录的旅游业激增的度假胜地实施秩序管制。【原文：Bali is considering a ban on Airbnb Inc.’s accommodation, its latest attempt to impose order on a resort island struggling to cope with a record surge in tourism.】

item.title: 一场 9.99 美元的骗局让印度超数字经济中的十亿人面临风险
item.description:
中国的数字革命造成了一个犯罪的乌托邦。商业周刊调查了从受害者到骗子的踪迹。【原文：

The country’s digital revolution has created a criminal dystopia. Businessweek investigates the trail from victims to scammers.

】

item.title: 印度的数字梦想，被黑客攻击"：我们如何报道此事
item.description:
利用警方日记、手机通话记录、WhatsApp 消息和数以千计的银行交易，我们得以还原 "数字逮捕 "受害者如何成为目标并受骗的过程。【原文：

Using police diaries, mobile-phone records, WhatsApp messages and thousands of banking transactions, we were able to reconstruct—sometimes down to the minute—how “digital arrest” victims were targeted and scammed.

】

item.title: Verdure 的目标是销售更多由屋顶太阳能支持的证券
item.description: Verdure 基金上个月售出了南非首批由小型太阳能发电设施贷款支持的证券，该基金计划从明年第一季度开始发行更多证券。【原文：Verdure Fund, which last month sold South Africa’s first securities backed by loans made to small-scale solar power facilities, plans further sales, starting with an issuance in the first quarter of next year.】

item.title: 法国、德国利润反弹面临风险，奢侈品和汽车行业举步维艰
item.description: 在汽车和奢侈品牌复苏的带动下，法国和德国的预期利润反弹似乎面临越来越大的风险。【原文：An expected profit rebound in France and Germany, led by a revival in cars and luxury labels, looks increasingly at risk.】

item.title: 据说日本央行可能在本月加息，日元走强
item.description: 彭博新闻社报道称，日本央行官员已准备好在本月加息，前提是在此期间经济或金融市场没有受到重大冲击。【原文：Japan’s currency rose against the dollar after Bloomberg News reported that Bank of Japan officials are ready to raise interest rates this month, provided there’s no major shock to the economy or financial markets in the meantime.】

item.title: 印度央行将购买 110 亿美元债券，持有 50 亿美元外汇掉期合约
item.description: 印度储备银行本月将购买价值 1 万亿卢比（110 亿美元）的债券，为银行系统注入流动性。债券收益。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India will buy bonds worth 1 trillion rupees ($11 billion) this month to inject liquidity into the banking system. Bonds gained.】

item.title: 印度央行在通胀率创历史新低后降息
item.description: 在通胀率降至历史最低点后，印度央行六个月来首次下调了基准利率，在美国高关税的影响下进一步提振了经济。【原文：India’s central bank lowered its benchmark interest rate for the first time in six months after inflation slid to an all-time low, giving the economy a further boost in the face of high US tariffs.】

item.title: 期权交易大师萨特遭印度监管机构打击
item.description: 印度市场监管机构已禁止阿瓦德胡特-萨特（Avadhut Sathe）的交易行为，他是一位深受欢迎的交易员，后转为期权培训师，据称他提供的投资建议被贴上了交易教育的标签。【原文：India’s market regulator has banned Avadhut Sathe, a popular trader-turned-options trainer, for allegedly giving investment advice labeled as trading education.】

item.title: 据说日本央行可能在 12 月会议上提高利率
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本央行官员已准备好在本月晚些时候举行的政策会议上提高利率，前提是在此期间经济或金融市场不会受到重大冲击。【原文：Bank of Japan officials are ready to raise interest rates at a policy meeting later this month, provided there’s no major shock to the economy or financial markets in the meantime, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟与 Netflix 开始独家协议谈判
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. has entered exclusive negotiations to sell its film and TV studios and HBO Max streaming service to Netflix Inc., according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 花旗看涨前景和供应担忧令铜价升至创纪录水平
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）看涨铜价前景，加上供需失衡的隐忧，铜价创下历史新高。【原文：Copper rose to a record, underpinned by a bullish price outlook from Citigroup Inc. and a looming supply-demand imbalance.】

item.title: 菲律宾放宽首次公开募股规则以吸引 GCash 等公司
item.description: 菲律宾证券监管机构计划放宽首次公开发行股票的自由流通量要求，以吸引更多公司，尤其是大公司，在菲律宾岌岌可危的股票市场上市。【原文：The Philippines’ securities regulator plans to relax free float requirements for initial public offerings as it seeks to entice more companies, especially large ones, to list on its faltering stock market.】

item.title: 铁矿石因季节性疲软和中国会议临近而下滑
item.description: 铁矿石价格本周首次下滑，原因是钢铁市场出现季节性疲软迹象，而且交易商对中国即将召开的经济政策会议进行了展望。【原文：Iron ore prices slipped for the first time this week as the steel market showed signs of seasonal weakness and traders looked ahead to China’s upcoming economic policy meeting.】

item.title: 印度股市吸引了俄罗斯的目光
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国摆脱关税恐慌，坚持出口驱动型增长
item.description: 人们普遍预计，在本月的重要政策会议上，中国领导人将坚持以制造业为主导的增长战略，尽管国内外要求更紧迫地转向消费的呼声日益高涨。【原文：China’s leaders are widely expected to stick with its manufacturing-led growth strategy in key policy meetings this month, even as calls grow at home and abroad for a more urgent shift toward consumption.】

item.title: 台湾以担心欺诈为由禁用中国红笔记应用一年
item.description: 台湾表示，出于对欺诈行为的担忧，它正在禁用中国应用程序 "小红书"（又称 "红笔记"）；这凸显了民主国家对来自海峡两岸的社交媒体应用程序的担忧。【原文：Taiwan said it was banning the Chinese app Xiaohongshu, also known as RedNote, due to fraud concerns — highlighting the democracy’s worries related to social media apps from across the strait.】

item.title: 墨丘利与刚果 Gecamines 建立矿产贸易伙伴关系
item.description: Mercuria Energy Trading 公司周四宣布，将与刚果民主共和国国有矿业公司 Gecamines SA 建立铜钴贸易伙伴关系。【原文：Mercuria Energy Trading is setting up a copper and cobalt trading partnership with Democratic Republic of Congo’s state-owned miner Gecamines SA, the African company announced Thursday.】

item.title: 中国 1.3 万亿美元的股票涨势面临跑输美国同行的风险
item.description: 在经济疲软导致早些时候的涨势戛然而止之后，中国在岸股市再次落后于美国股市，而货币宽松的希望则让华尔街重燃乐观情绪。【原文：Chinese onshore stocks are trailing their US peers again after a weak economy cut short an earlier rally, while monetary easing hopes revived optimism on Wall Street.】

item.title: 菲律宾 11 月通胀放缓，可能有助于再次降息
item.description: 由于贪污丑闻打击了消费者和投资者的信心，菲律宾 11 月份通胀放缓，支持了基准利率的再次下调。【原文：Philippine inflation slowed in November, supporting another cut in benchmark interest rates as a graft scandal shattered consumer and investor confidence.】

item.title: 刺激经济的希望使 Man Group 的日本基金向国内公司倾斜
item.description: Man Group Plc 旗下的日本大型价值基金正更多地转向国内股票，因为该基金预计日本新政府的议程将有利于当地经济。【原文：Man Group Plc’s large-cap Japan value fund is shifting more to domestic-focus stocks as it expects the agenda of the nation’s new administration to benefit local economies.】

item.title: 李明博期待在戒严一年后刺激韩国市场发展
item.description: 韩国前领导人试图实施戒严令的灾难性举动动摇了韩国一年，一年后，李在明总统恢复了稳定，现在正利用他的声望推进有利于投资者的举措。【原文：A year after South Korea was shaken by its former leader’s disastrous attempt to impose martial law, President Lee Jae Myung has restored stability and is now using his popularity to press ahead with investor-friendly moves.】
